value:
$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|WOOOO! BEACH DAAAAAYYYY!$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Caspar... You're being a little loud,
don't you think? Some people here
are trying to relax...$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Bah! C'mon, Ashe, after we came
all this way, you want to keep it
down now that we're here?!$k$pBesides, check THIS out! I already
caught this absolute lunker of a fish!$k$p...Honestly, I don't much like the
taste of fish, but catching them is
too fun to pass up!$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Wow, that is a rather incredible
catch, I must admit!$k$pThough...I myself have already
caught three fish, as you can
see here.$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Oh yeah! Not bad!$k$pI have an idea! Let's have a friendly
little contest! A fishing competition
just between us!$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Sounds good to me, but I'll warn
you now... I'm not going to lose!$k$p

$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Aaaannnd...BOOM! Look at the size
of this thing! You think you can
compete with that?$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Well...I caught 35 fish.$k$pIn terms of quantity, I win.$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|What? Quantity?! You win by getting
the bigger fish, right?$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|No, the winner is whoever catches
the most fish, obviously.$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|You never said anything about that!$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|I have no memory of you mentioning
size as the criteria either!$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Then how are we going to figure
out which of us wins? ...Ugh!
How annoying...$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Hmm... Well, we could still alter the
competition criteria now.$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Huh? How would we do that fairly?$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|We'll cook our fish, and then have
everyone else judge which of our
fish is the tastiest!$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|B-but I can't really...cook.$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|That's no problem! I can handle all
the cooking. I'm pretty good, so you
have nothing to worry about!$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|...You could just prepare my fish
so it tastes bad. That's something
I'm worried about!$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|What do you take me for? I would
never do something so underhanded!$k$pWhat kind of person would I be if
I were to make everyone eat gross
food on purpose like that?$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Hah! All right then, fine. I guess I have
nothing to worry about! I'll go carry
all these fish to the kitchen!$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Thank you. Oh, and would you mind
if I take a few fillets back home with
me afterward?$k$pI'm sure the cat in the pantry would
appreciate a taste as well...$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Of course! I'm sure he'll enjoy
that regardless of which of our
fish he gets to sample.$k$p
